summary.para: Occurs before the document is saved (exported to a certain format).

Locks the RichEditDocumentServer object by disallowing visual updates until the EndUpdate or CancelUpdate method is called.
Fires when the DOCVARIABLE field is updated.
Unlocks the RichEditDocumentServer object after it has been locked by the BeginUpdate method, without causing an immediate visual update.
Occurs when the document content was changed.

Occurs after a document is loaded.

Gets the current dpi value for the Y-coordinate.
Occurs when a new document is created.

Lists start/stop patterns used in bar codes.
The first element in a barcode is "A" and the last element is "T".
The first element in a barcode is "B" and the last element is "N".
The first element in a barcode is "C" and the last element is "*".
The first element in a barcode is "D" and the last element is "E".
There are no start (first) and stop (last) elements used in a barcode.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.AutoSize

summary.para: Allows you to create an image in a size that fits all the specified barcode options.

member.value: true, to create an image unrestricted to the specified size; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.BackColor

summary.para: Gets or sets the background color of a bar code image.

member.value: A object specifying the image background color.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.BarCodeImage

summary.para: Gets the bar code image.

member.value: A object that is the bar code image.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.BarHeight

summary.para: Gets or sets the height of bars in a bar code.

member.value: A value that specifies the bar height in current units.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.BorderColor

summary.para: Gets or sets the border color of the bar code image.

member.value: A object that is the border color.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.BorderWidth

summary.para: Specifies the border width of the barcode image.

member.value: A value that is the border width, measured in units specified by the property.

summary.para: Provides access to characteristics of the bar code bottom caption.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.CodeBinaryData

summary.para: Gets or sets the byte array to be coded into certain barcode types.

member.value: An array of bytes to be coded using the barcode's symbology.

member.value: A string containing the text represented by a barcode.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.CodeTextFont

summary.para: Specifies the font used to display the barcode text.

member.value: A object that specifies the font attributes.

member.value: A enumeration value that specifies how the barcode text is aligned within the image.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.CodeTextVerticalAlignment

summary.para: Get or sets the vertical alignment of the barcode text within the barcode image.

member.value: A enumeration value that specifies how the barcode text is aligned within the image.

summary.para: Resets the barcode image, disposes of the BarCode object and releases all the allocated resources.

summary.para: Gets or sets the dpi value used to render the barcode.

member.value: A value representing the dpi value used to create the barcode image.

summary.para: Gets or sets the dpi value for the X-coordinate used to render the barcode.

member.value: A value representing the dpi value used to create the barcode image.

member.name: P:DevExpress.BarCodes.BarCode.DpiY

summary.para: Gets or sets the dpi value for the Y-coordinate used to render the barcode.

member.value: A value representing the dpi value used to create the barcode image.

member.value: true, if the control can be printed and exported; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Provides access to margin widths set for a barcode image.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Spreadsheet.Workbook.AddService(System.Type,System.Object,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Adds the specified service to the service container.

member.param: The type of service to add.
An instance of the service type to add. This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the serviceType parameter.
true to promote this request to any parent service containers; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Spreadsheet.Workbook.AddService(System.Type,System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Adds the specified service to the service container.

member.param: The type of service to add.
A callback object that is used to create the service. This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays the creation of the object until the service is requested.
true to promote this request to any parent service containers; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Spreadsheet.Workbook.AddService(System.Type,System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback)

A callback object that is used to create the service. This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays the creation of the object until the service is requested.

summary.para: Occurs before the document is saved (exported to a certain format).
Occurs before a document is loaded (imported from an external source).
Locks updates of the Workbook until the method call.
Forces recalculation of the workbook.
Unlocks the object after it has been locked by the BeginUpdate method, without causing an immediate update.
Occurs when the workbook undo history changes. By default, undo history is not logged for the Workbook instance, so the event is not raised.
Creates a new workbook.

summary.para: Provides access to a collection of custom functions in a workbook
